attributes.action: create an english devolved parliament (as per Scotland, Ireland, Wales)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the ongoing devolution process it appears that the needs and desires of the English public have been overlooked and will therefore not have a representative view in the decisions of the british government. I propose a devolved free standing English parliament to properly uphold the wishes of the English peoples.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
